component.text:
Activity – Part 1: Compare and Contrast OSPFv2 and OSPFv3

Listed on the graphic are statements, which describe OSPFv2, OSPFv3, or both. Drag the OSPF version identifier (OSPFv2, OSPFv3, or Both) to the corresponding function or feature descriptions. Version identifiers may be used more than one time. Click Button 2 to continue this activity.
You have successfully matched each OSPF function or feature description with its version. Click Button 2 to continue this activity.
You have not successfully matched each OSPF function or feature description with its version. Please click Reset to try again.

Activity – Part 2: Compare and Contrast OSPFv2 and OSPFv3

Listed on the graphic are statements, which describe OSPFv2, OSPFv3, or both. Drag the OSPF version identifier (OSPFv2, OSPFv3, or Both) to the corresponding function or feature descriptions. Version identifiers may be used more than one time.
Elects a DR and a BDR
Uses FF02::6 for DR and BDR multicasts
Uses 224.0.0.6 for DR and BDR multicasts
You have successfully matched each OSPF function or feature description with its version.
You have not successfully matched each OSPF function or feature description with its version. Please click Reset to try again.
